page.title: 11LINDRIDGE SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE 45 CHILDREN AND THEY TRAVEL BY CAR OR MINIBUS HIRED BY PARENTS. THERE ARE 2 CLASSES, INFANTS AND JUNIORS, AND SCHOOL LASTS FROM 9AM TILL 4PM. DINNERTIME IS FROM NOON UNTIL 1PM, AND ALL CHILDREN HAVE SANDWICHES AND CAN BUY MILK FOR 5P A DAY. THERE IS A TUCKSHOP ON MONDAY WHEN LOLLIPOPS AND SWEETS ARE SOLD. NATIONAL SAVINGS MONEY AND MILK MONEY IS ALSO COLLECTED THEN.ON TUESDAY MRS TAYLERSON GIVES CLARINET AND FLUTE LESSONS TO THE GOOD RECORDER PLAYERS. ALL CHILDREN GO SWIMMING AT TENBURY BATHS EACH WEDNESDAY.CANON BAKER COMES IN TO TAKE R.E. ON FRIDAYS, AND PARENTS DURING THE WEEK TO HELP WITH COOKING, CRAFT ETC. THE LIBRARY VAN VISITS SCHOOL EVERY TERM AND ABOUT 200 BOOKS ARE BORROWED.
